description: Enables the user to transfer a remaining quantity of material from a container to another batch, location, or to waste at runtime.
intent: Allow the operator to record and commit the transfer of remaining raw material quantities according to the selected transfer option.
postconditions: Transfer entry is added to current transfer grid
Material quantity is moved to the selected destination
side_effects: May print waste or transfer labels depending on selection
Confirmation dialogs displayed for conflicting allocations
example_usage: Operator scans container ID, enters transfer quantity, selects a transfer option (e.g., Transfer To Batch), chooses destination, and clicks Finish to commit the transfer.
